text: Armen Hovhannisyan (; born 7 March 2000) is an Armenian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Slovak club FC Nitra and Armenia U21. ==Career== ===Zemplín Michalovce=== Hovhannisyan made his professional debut for Zemplín Michalovce against DAC Dunajská Streda on 24 May 2019. DAC had won the game 5-0. Hovhannisyan had replaced Sadam Sulley 56 minutes into the game, when the score was 4-0. Souleymane Kone had scored the final goal some 13 minutes after Armen's arrival.DAC VS. ZEMPLÍN MICHALOVCE 5 - 0 24.05.2019, soccerway.com He scored his first league goal for Zemplín on 30 November 2019, in a match against iClinic Sereď at neutral Stadium Myjava, in a 2:0 victory. Hovhannisyan came on as a stoppage time replacement for Modibo Sidibé, but managed to score a goal from a counter-attack set by Christos Kountouriotis. He managed to score again in the next round too, during a home match against Spartak Trnava. Hovhannisyan came on as a replacement for Sidibé once again, this time after the Nigerien striker suffered an injury in the 50th minute. In this match, Hovhannisyan scored following a pass by Peter Kolesár, sealing the score of the game for 2:0. ==References== ==External links== * *Futbalnet profile * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Yerevan Category:Armenian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Armenia youth international footballers Category:Armenian expatriate footballers Category:FC Ararat-Armenia players Category:Armenian First League players Category:MFK Zemplín Michalovce players Category:FC Nitra players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovakia Category:Armenian expatriate sportspeople in Slovakia
title: Armen Hovhannisyan (footballer)
